item.description: You are invited to join the Jumbo Faculty & Staff NCAA March Madness bracket group! To accept this invitation and join the group, click the link below (or cut and paste the link into your browser's address bar). http://jumbofacstaff.... You'll be asked to enter the group's password before you can join. The group password is "Tufts". The pool is completely free this year and the winner will be treated to lunch at a local restaurant of their choosing by me, Rich Kelley, Budget & Fiscal Officer of Arts & Sciences. Ok, here's the most important part, if you know of any Tufts colleagues who might be interested in joining, please pass along the invitation to them and ask them to join our Tufts Faculty & Staff Social Group on Meet-up.com. http://www.meetup.com... If you have any questions, shoot me an email at rich.kelley@hotmail.com. Good luck!
item.name: Jumbo NCAA Men's Basketball Bracket Pool
